text: إِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمُۗ وَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعِلۡمُ بَغۡيَۢا بَيۡنَهُمۡۗ وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

translation.en: Indeed, the religion in the sight of Allah is Islam. And those who were given the Scripture did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And whoever disbelieves in the verses of Allah, then indeed, Allah is swift in [taking] account
translation.id: (Sesungguhnya agama di sisi Allah ialah Islam. Tidaklah berselisih orang-orang yang telah diberi Kitab115) kecuali setelah mereka memperoleh ilmu, karena kedengkian di antara mereka. Barang siapa ingkar terhadap ayat-ayat Allah, maka sungguh, Allah sangat cepat perhitungan-Nya
